fields.name: ThinkPad X1 Yoga Gen 6 (14 Intel)
fields.description: Meet the 6th generation of the ThinkPad X1 Yoga, a 14inch 2-in-1 laptop that's been reimagined to enhance your experience. You'll still find the details you've enjoyed on our premium X1 Yoga, and you'll discover an impressive 16:10 display, a wider TouchPad, a larger battery for more time unplugged, and a new Storm Gray colour with tone-matched keyboard. Plus, with the Intel® Evo® platform, you get a super-responsive device that's ready whenever you need it.
